index~.c

00001 /* index~.c - SDK example of an object which accesses an MSP buffer~
00002 
00003 */
00004 
00005 #include "ext.h"
00006 #include "ext_common.h" // contains CLIP macro
00007 #include "z_dsp.h"
00008 #include "buffer.h" // this defines our buffer's data structure and other goodies
00009 #include "ext_atomic.h"
00010 
00011 void *index_class;
00012 
00013 typedef struct _index
00014 {
00015     t_pxobject l_obj;
00016     t_symbol *l_sym;
00017     t_buffer *l_buf;
00018     long l_chan;
00019 } t_index;
00020 
00021 t_int *index_perform(t_int *w);
00022 void index_dsp(t_index *x, t_signal **sp);
00023 void index_set(t_index *x, t_symbol *s);
00024 void *index_new(t_symbol *s, long chan);
00025 void index_in1(t_index *x, long n);
00026 void index_assist(t_index *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00027 void index_dblclick(t_index *x);
00028 
00029 t_symbol *ps_buffer;
00030 
00031 int main(void)
00032 {
00033     setup((t_messlist **)&index_class, (method)index_new, (method)dsp_free, (short)sizeof(t_index), 0L, 
00034         A_SYM, A_DEFLONG, 0);
00035     addmess((method)index_dsp, "dsp", A_CANT, 0);
00036     addmess((method)index_set, "set", A_SYM, 0);
00037     addinx((method)index_in1,1);
00038     addmess((method)index_assist, "assist", A_CANT, 0);
00039     addmess((method)index_dblclick, "dblclick", A_CANT, 0);
00040     dsp_initclass();
00041     ps_buffer = gensym("buffer~");
00042 
00043     return 0;
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00047 t_int *index_perform(t_int *w)
00048 {
00049     t_index *x = (t_index *)(w[1]);
00050     t_float *in = (t_float *)(w[2]);
00051     t_float *out = (t_float *)(w[3]);
00052     int n = (int)(w[4]);
00053     t_buffer *b = x->l_buf;
00054     float *tab;
00055     double temp;
00056     double f;
00057     long index,chan,frames,nc;
00058     
00059     if (x->l_obj.z_disabled)
00060         goto out;
00061     if (!b)
00062         goto zero;
00063     ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&b->b_inuse);
00064     if (!b->b_valid) {
00065         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&b->b_inuse);
00066         goto zero;
00067     }
00068     tab = b->b_samples;
00069     chan = x->l_chan;
00070     frames = b->b_frames;
00071     nc = b->b_nchans;
00072     while (n--) {
00073         temp = *in++;
00074         f = temp + 0.5;
00075         index = f;
00076         if (index < 0)
00077             index = 0;
00078         else if (index >= frames)
00079             index = frames - 1;
00080         if (nc > 1)
00081             index = index * nc + chan;
00082         *out++ = tab[index];
00083     }
00084     ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&b->b_inuse);
00085     return w + 5;
00086 zero:
00087     while (n--) *out++ = 0.;
00088 out:
00089     return w + 5;
00090 }
00091 
00092 // here's where we set the buffer~ we're going to access
00093 void index_set(t_index *x, t_symbol *s)
00094 {
00095     t_buffer *b;
00096     
00097     if (s) {
00098         x->l_sym = s;
00099         if ((b = (t_buffer *)(s->s_thing)) && ob_sym(b) == ps_buffer) {
00100             x->l_buf = b;
00101         } else {
00102             object_error((t_object *)x, "no buffer~ %s", s->s_name);
00103             x->l_buf = 0;
00104         }
00105     } else {
00106         // this will reappear every time the dsp is restarted; do we really want it?
00107         object_error((t_object *)x, "no buffer~ object specified");
00108     }
00109 }
00110 
00111 void index_in1(t_index *x, long n)
00112 {
00113     if (n)
00114         x->l_chan = CLIP(n,1,4) - 1;
00115     else
00116         x->l_chan = 0;
00117 }
00118 
00119 void index_dsp(t_index *x, t_signal **sp)
00120 {
00121     index_set(x,x->l_sym);
00122     dsp_add(index_perform, 4, x, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[1]->s_vec, sp[0]->s_n);
00123 }
00124 
00125 // this lets us double-click on index~ to open up the buffer~ it references
00126 void index_dblclick(t_index *x)
00127 {
00128     t_buffer *b;
00129     
00130     if ((b = (t_buffer *)(x->l_sym->s_thing)) && ob_sym(b) == ps_buffer)
00131         mess0((t_object *)b,gensym("dblclick"));
00132 }
00133 
00134 void index_assist(t_index *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00135 {
00136     if (m == ASSIST_OUTLET)
00137         sprintf(s,"(signal) Sample Value at Index");
00138     else {
00139         switch (a) {    
00140             case 0: sprintf(s,"(signal) Sample Index"); break;
00141             case 1: sprintf(s,"Audio Channel In buffer~");  break;
00142         }
00143     }
00144 }
00145 
00146 void *index_new(t_symbol *s, long chan)
00147 {
00148     t_index *x = (t_index *)newobject(index_class);
00149     dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x, 1);
00150     intin((t_object *)x,1);
00151     outlet_new((t_object *)x, "signal");
00152     x->l_sym = s;
00153     index_in1(x,chan);
00154     return (x);
00155 }
